Package cz.dhl.ftp

Class Summary
Ftp Allows connect to FTP server and maintains control connection.
FtpConnect Wrapper for FTP connect & login information.
FtpContext Maintains FTP client settings & context.
FtpFile Allows uniform manipulation with FTP files.
FtpInputStream Allows reading from FTP file.
FtpListInputStream Allows to list FTP directory.
FtpOutputStream Allows writing into FTP file.
FtpSetting Wrapper for FTP client settings.
 

Available from sourceforge http://sourceforge.net/projects/jvftp under the terms of GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL).
